dpgroup.name: All Distribution Points

query.name: Contoso - Serial, MAC and Hostname
query.comment: Serial Number, MAC address and Hostname for all Devices
query.expression: select distinct SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_G_System_SYSTEM_ENCLOSURE.SerialNumber, SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER.MACAddress, SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER_CONFIGURATION.IPEnabled from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_SYSTEM_ENCLOSURE on SMS_G_System_SYSTEM_ENCLOSURE.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId inner join SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER on SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId inner join SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER_CONFIGURATION on SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER_CONFIGURATION.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER_CONFIGURATION.IPEnabled = 1 and SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER.MACAddress not like '' order by SMS_R_System.Name

query.name: Contoso - Windows Server Features
query.expression: select distinct SMS_G_System_SERVER_FEATURE.Name from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_SERVER_FEATURE on SMS_G_System_SERVER_FEATURE.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId order by SMS_G_System_SERVER_FEATURE.Name

collection.name: Users - Title - Research Analysts
